Class BnBStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.pld.agile.model.strategy.BnBStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolvingStrategy
public class BnBStrategy extends Object implements SolvingStrategy
The BnBStrategy class implements the SolvingStrategy interface and solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using the Branch and Bound (BnB) algorithm. This class serves as a strategy in the strategy pattern for solving the TSP.

  • Constructor Details

    • BnBStrategy

      public BnBStrategy()
      Constructs a new BnBStrategy instance with a fresh BranchAndBound solver. Initializes the best path to an empty list.

  • Method Details

    • solve

      public void solve(ArrayList<ArrayList<Double>> completeMatrix)
      Solves the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using the Branch and Bound algorithm. It takes the complete graph represented by a cost matrix, sets it in the BranchAndBound object, and finds the best cost and path.
      Specified by:
      solve in interface SolvingStrategy
      Parameters:
      completeMatrix - the complete graph represented as a cost matrix, where each entry indicates the cost (or distance) between two vertices

    • getBestPath

      public List<Integer> getBestPath()
      Returns the best path found by the Branch and Bound algorithm.
      Specified by:
      getBestPath in interface SolvingStrategy
      Returns:
      the best path as a List<Integer> of vertex indices

    • getBestCost

      public double getBestCost()
      Returns the best cost found by the Branch and Bound algorithm.
      Specified by:
      getBestCost in interface SolvingStrategy
      Returns:
      the best cost as a double value
